ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Follow up (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: Ha!  You assume that because I work here, I get good prices on drives.. BAH! Welcome to Dilbert Land :) Our Employee Discount enables us to buy drives at
ygData.messageBody:
Ha! You assume that because I work here, I get good prices on drives.. BAH!
Welcome to Dilbert Land :)
Our Employee "Discount" enables us to buy drives at prices comparable to
CompUSA sales - hehe.

Besides.. are you sure you want to switch to Maxtor? Didn't I tell you that
I work in Reliability?
Taking your chances............

So I know this is "only a game," but I was wondering... do you suppose there
are enough EQ geeks around that putting on my resume under Accomplishments
"Level 50 Shaman and level 20 Bard on EQ" would like get me a job?

Hehehe ok, yes I've lost it :)

Wendy


-----Original Message-----
From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:honeyman@...]
Sent: Wednesday, March 08, 2000 9:08 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Follow up (OT)


From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>

> Wendy Lynn Cranfill
> Maxtor Corporation

What are the chances of getting us all a discount on Maxtor
Part# 54098U8.

40GB (7200rpm/2MB cache) hard drives ;-)

I think I'm gonna buy one in a few weeks. I'm usually a Western
Digital or Seagate guy myself. But those drive specs on that HD
aren't too shabby. I'm willing to convert =o)

Harmonic.
